Answer
An undertaking shall disclose and update their Gross Scopes 1, 2, 3 and Total GHG emissions on
an annual basis (consistent with financial statements, as per ESRS 1 paragraph 73) and in
accordance with the provisions of ESRS 1 and ESRS E1-6.
